item.title: Tweets
item.description: "I, Pencil" An essay published in 1958 which beautifully describes the amount of human coordination, cooperation and trade that needs to happen for the creation of a seemingly simple object, a lead pencil. ✏️ It's a great read: https://t.co/P4Ha7HpoGp pic.twitter.com/vPPZuCZ5cB — Fermat's Library (@fermatslibrary) April 6, 2021
item.content:
"I, Pencil"

An essay published in 1958 which beautifully describes the amount of human coordination, cooperation and trade that needs to happen for the creation of a seemingly simple object, a lead pencil. ✏️

It's a great read: https://t.co/P4Ha7HpoGp pic.twitter.com/vPPZuCZ5cB

— Fermat's Library (@fermatslibrary) April 6, 2021
